name: Samsill Spiral Folder Organizer (2-Pack) - 5 Dividers & 10 Pockets with Zipper Pouch, Multi Pocket Color Cordinated Folder Binder with Customizable Tabs, Document Organizer (Fashion)
short_description: Need to organize multiple projects? Then this is the product for you. It has 5 color dividers and 10 pockets with write on tabs to sort classwork and documents for school or home office.
Carrying pens and sticky notes too? Then this is the product for you. A built in inner zipper pouch holds supplies so you carry one organizer not many, and the spiral lays flat for easy writing.
Want to find sections faster? Then this is the product for you. Fashion colors and erasable tabs make a simple color code for subjects clients or tasks so you file and retrieve in seconds.

Worried about daily wear in a backpack? Then this is the product for you. Thick moisture resistant poly protects letter sized sheets, the smooth plastic spiral will not snag, and reinforced corners resist tears.

Need one tool for many workflows? Then this is the product for you. Plan weekly sprints or monthly archives, use it as a slim portfolio, and rely on a 10 pocket folder that adapts to homework lessons receipts and projects.
product_description: If you juggle assignments, meetings, and household tasks, the Samsill Deluxe 10 Pocket Spiral Project Organizer is your all-in-one command center. With 5 color dividers and 10 roomy pockets, you can park each project in its own place, label it with erasable write-on tabs, and get back to work fast. The integrated inner zipper pouch corrals pens, paper clips, highlighters, sticky notes, and small tech so you carry one organizer—not a bundle of accessories. Ideal for parents, teachers, students, and busy professionals, this lightweight spiral design lays flat on the desk for easy viewing and note-taking. Made from thick, moisture-resistant poly, the folders protect letter sheets from daily wear. Reinforced pocket corners prevent blow-outs, while the smooth spiral won’t snag or deform like wire bindings. Use color-coding to separate class subjects, client files, home renovation phases, or tax receipts. Add schedules to the front cover to create a quick-glance dashboard. Whether you need a slim portfolio for meetings, a homework station for kids, or a household document organizer, this multi-pocket system adapts as your workflow changes. Smart search terms shoppers use include: folder with multiple pockets, pocket binder, homework organizer, project organizer, notebook with folder pockets, folder organizer binder, medical binder organizer, multi folder, school binder organizer, notebook folder, multi pocket folder organizer, folder notebook, organizer folders for paperwork, 12 pocket folder organizer, medical records organizer binder.
